channel.title: Some1 please help!
channel.description: hello, while editing my server i stuffed up my ::yell command i need some1 to give me the code for yell to put in my client.java

item.title: Some1 please help!
item.dc:creator: @tubefish tubefish
item.description:
@tubefish wrote:

[code=java]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 4) {
                titles = "[Super Player] ";
            }
            if (donator == 1) {
                titles = "[Donator] ";
            }
	if (playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "[Player] ";
            }
	if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("OWNERS NAME")) {
                titles = "[The Mighty Boss and Owner]";
            }
            talk(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));
    }[/code]

Read full topic
